feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.63
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Always close sidebar when user clicks ESC. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Added 'n' shortcut for adding new minicards to current list. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Patch to allow shortcuts to work when another keyboard layout is used. Thanks to NadavTasher.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated scaling docs. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix some text alignment issues when using RTL languages. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Hide scrollbars where they interrupt. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Disable sidebar showing when filtering using keyboard shortcut. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Change move-to-archive keyboard shortcut to '-', because of Ctrl + C shortcut. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Potential bug(fix?) - Add assign-self keyboard shortcut (old shortcut actually adds). Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Sidebar style overhaul - absolute positioning, weird style fixes, disable sidebar scrollbar. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Revert adding more stack size. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.64
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Add missing semicolon in keyboard.js. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Make lists fill up space evenly, change listWidth to max-width. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Change way of disabling scrollbars, disable swimlane scrollbars. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Improve list auto-width, fix regressions. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.65
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Revert some scrollbar, sidebar and list width changes. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.67
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Re-introduce list auto-width feature, Reverted scrollbar hiding, Fixed transparent sidebar bug. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.68
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Speed improvements to building WeKan x86_64 Dockerfile. Using Ubuntu 24.04 Docker base image. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
